name: Flaggit
description:
This is Flaggit.

An artgame in which you play between 2D and 3D worlds and flag everything you can find! Your problem solving skills are tested while also providing you with an immersive experience.

It was developed by young Game Devs Bernat Szekely and me - Samuel Ellmauer.

If you think Flaggit is behaving weirdly - that's fine! It's all part of the game :)

You can find Bernat's itch.io page here:  https://bernadotornado.itch.io/
